benefits.title: Decrease in pulse rate by 3.9%
benefits.text:
Time in nature can result in a decrease in pulse rate (the physical sensation of a heart beat felt in the body) by 3.9%
Among healthy people, a lower resisting pulse rate is an indicator of a strong heart.

benefits.title: Feel more relaxed, yet energized
benefits.text:

benefits.title: Decrease systolic blood pressure 1.9%
